alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 5:24AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 524 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkwood, or near Corpus Christi International Airport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Taft, Corpus Christi International Airport, Ingleside, Odem, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay, Flour Bluff, Corpus Christi North Beach, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Bay Area Medical Center, Spohn Hospital South, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Clarkwood, Annaville, Waldron Field, La Palmera Mall, Del Mar College Windward Campus and Corpus Christi Country Club. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 14. US Highway 181 between mile markers 630 and 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 654 and 656. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
